## Initial exploratory data analysis

```{r}
job_postings <- job_postings |> 
  drop_na(views)
```


```{r}
job_postings |>
  ggplot(aes(x = views)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
summary(job_postings$views)
```

```{r}
two_thousand <- job_postings |>
  filter(views > 2000)
```



```{r}
two_thousand
```

```{r}
job_postings |>
  ggplot(aes(x = applies, y = views, color = pay_period)) +
  geom_point() + 
  facet_wrap(~pay_period)
```
```{r}
job_postings |>
  ggplot(aes(x = applies, y = views, color = pay_period)) +
  geom_point() 
```

```{r}
job_postings |>
  ggplot(aes(x = applies, y = views, color = formatted_work_type)) +

  facet_wrap(~formatted_work_type)
```

job_postings_exp_na <- job_postings |>
